Title: LA-U3 L6 Letter A
Content: 本节课我们学习33-34课时Language Arts语文课Unit 3 Phonics for beginners. Lesson 6  Letter A主要学习内容如下:【1】学习了高频词see. 关键句是 What can you see in the city?【2】认识字母A并了解以字母A开头的单词【3】掌握字母A的发音并能在文章中找出以/a/音或者letter A开头的单词.【4】引导孩子们回想以/ae/发音的单词,如 : apple, ant, astronaut, alligator, ax, airplane, arrow, angry等【5】学习了小文章I See. I see the apple. I see the astronaut. I see the ambulance. I see the ants.本节课的关键句是: 【1】What is the letter? (这是什么字母?)It’s letter A.【2】Which word begins with letter A? (哪些词是以字母A开头的单词?)Apple/ant/astronaut（宇航员）/alligator（鳄鱼）/ax（斧子）/airplane(飞机)/arrow（箭头）/angry begins with letter A.【3】Please circle the word which begins with letter A? (请圈出以A开头的单词)【4】What sound does letter A make? （A发什么音?）A makes the sound /ae/（此处为自然拼读音标）.【5】Please circle the word that begins with the sound /ae/.(请圈出以/ae/开头的单词.)【6】What sound does Apple/ant/astronaut（宇航员）/alligator（鳄鱼）/ax（斧子）/airplane(飞机)/arrow（箭头）/angry begins with?引导孩子说 Apple/ant/astronaut/alligator/ax/airplane/arrow/angry begins with the sound /ae/.学习元音A的发音,孩子们可以有拼读意识了.您可以在家里引导孩子拼读:sat, tam, mat拼读.引导孩子说’S says /s/, A says /a/, T says /t/, (注:这种标音法非国际音标,为自然拼读标音法)/s/-/a/-/t/-sat’.

Title: LA-U3 L7 Letter T
Content: 本节课我们学习35-36课时Language Arts语文课Unit 3 Phonics for beginners. Lesson 7 Letter T主要学习内容如下:【1】学习了高频词we. 关键句是 Our cat purrs when we pet her.【2】认识字母T并了解以字母T开头的单词【3】掌握字母T的发音并能在文章中找出以/t/音或者letter T开头的单词.【4】引导孩子们回想以/t/发音的单词,如 : towel, tank, turtle, tooth, toothbrush, toothpaste等【5】学习了小文章We like Toys. I like the tiger. I like the truck. I like the tools. I like the ants.本节课的关键句是: 【1】What is the letter? (这是什么字母?)It’s letter T.【2】Which word begins with letter T? (哪些词是以字母T开头的单词?)Tiger(老虎)/Table（桌子）/Tent （帐篷）/Tomato（西红柿）begins with letter T.【3】Please circle the word which begins with letterT ? (请圈出以T开头的单词)【4】What sound does letter T make? （T发什么音?）T makes the sound /t/（此处为自然拼读音标）.【5】Please circle the word that begins with the sound /t/.(请圈出以/t/开头的单词.)【6】What sound does Toothpaste/Toy/Tap（水龙头）/Television/Toothbrush/Tank/Turtle/ Towel（毛巾） begins with?引导孩子说 Toothpaste/Toy/Tap/Television/Toothbrush/Tank/Turtle/ Towel begins with the sound /t/.

Title: LA-U3 L8 Letter C
Content: 本节课我们学习37-38课时Language Arts语文课Unit 3 Phonics for beginners. Lesson 8 Letter C主要学习内容如下:【1】学习了高频词a. 关键句是This rabbit sits on a log.【2】学习一个关于C 的小Chant  The C Chant C says /c/, C says /c/, cat cat /c/ /c/ /c/.可替换的 词: clock, car.【3】复习开头音Clock begins with the sound /c/【4】学习了小文章I Can See. I see a cat. I see a caterpillar. I see a computer. I see a castle.本节课的关键句是: 【1】What is the letter? (这是什么字母?)It’s letter C.【2】What letter does cake/coat/… begins with? (哪些词是以字母T开头的单词?)Cake/Coat/…begins with letter C.【3】Please circle the word which begins with letter C ? (请圈出以C开头的单词)【4】What sound does letter C make? （C发什么音?）C makes the sound /c/（此处为自然拼读音标）.

Title: LA-U3 L9 Letter P
Content: 本节课我们学习 39-40课时Language Arts语文课Unit 3 Phonics for beginners. Lesson 9  Letter P主要学习内容如下:【1】学习了高频词to. 关键句是We like to ride our bikes.【2】学习一个关于P 的小Chant  The P Chant P says /p/, P says /p/, pig, pig /p//p//p/可替换的词: panda,pizza【3】复习开头音Pig begins with the sound /p/.【4】学习了小文章I like Animals. I like to see pigs. I like to see pandas. I like to see polar bears. I like to see parrots.本节课的关键句是: 【1】What is the letter? (这是什么字母?)It’s letter C.【2】What letter does cake/coat/… begins with? (哪些词是以字母T开头的单词?)Cake/Coat/…begins with letter C.【3】Please circle the word which begins with letter C ? (请圈出以C开头的单词)【4】What sound does letter C make? （C发什么音?）C makes the sound /c/（此处为自然拼读音标）.

Title: LA-U3 L10 Letter O
Content: 本节课我们学习41-42课时Language Arts语文课Unit 3 Phonics for beginners. Lesson 10  Letter O主要学习内容如下:【1】复习高频词see, we. 尝试用这两个词造句.【2】学习小故事Mmmm, Good. I like apples. I like tomatoes. We like carrots. We like to see pumpkins. 并对蔬菜水果进行复习.【3】学习小故事The Playground. I like the swing. I like to play jump-rope. We see the slide. We like the fountain.【4】认识字母O并了解以/o/开头的单词.【5】掌握字母O的发音并能在文章中找出以/o/音或者O开头的单词【6】锻炼孩子们看词能读,听音能写的能力,能够听懂和写 Sam, tam, mat, sat, not, cop, Pat, Pot...等以S, T, M, A, C, O, P任意三个字母组合的三字词.【7】引导孩子们回想以/o/发音的单词,如:off, oil, open, ox, octopus, orange, ocean等本节课的关键句是: 【1】What is the letter? (这是什么字母?)It’s letter  O.【2】Which word begins with letter O? (哪些词是以字母O开头的单词?)Ostrich（鸵鸟）/Olive（橄榄）/Otter（水獭）/Ox（公牛）/Octopus/On/Off begins with letter O.【3】Please circle the word which begins with letter O ? (请圈出以O开头的单词)【4】What sound does letter O make? （O发什么音?）O makes the sound /o/（此处为自然拼读音标）.【5】Please circle the word that begins with the sound /o/.(请圈出以/o/开头的单词.)【6】What sound does off/oil/open/ox/octopus/orange/ocean begins with?引导孩子说  off/oil/open/ox/octopus/orange/ocean begins with the sound /o/.

Title: LA-U3 L11  Letter N
Content: 本节课我们学习43-44课时Language Arts语文课Unit 3 Phonics for beginners. Lesson 11  Letter N主要学习内容如下:【1】学习高频词come, me. 关键句是: The rain will come down in spring. This hat is for me.【2】学习小故事Come and See Me.  内容是: Pat Cat! Pat Cat! Pat, Pat, Pat! Come to me, Pat Cat! Pat Cat sat. Sam Cat, Sam Cat! Sam, Sam, Sam! Come to me, Sam Cat! Sam Cat Sat.【3】学习小故事Pam and Me. 内容是:Pam, Pam, Pam, Pam! Pam, Pam, Pam! Come to me, Pam. I sat. Pam Cat sat. I pat Pam. Pat, pat, pat. 【4】Find the N Sound 认识字母N并了解以/n/开头的单词.【5】Find N Words 掌握字母N的发音并能在文章中找出以/n/音或者letter N开头的单词. 锻炼孩子们看词能读,听音能写的能力,能够听懂和写 Sam, tan, mat, sat, nat...等以S, T, M, A, N,任意三个字母组合的三字词.本节课的关键句是: 【1】What is the letter? (这是什么字母?)It’s letter  N.【2】Which word begins with letter N? (哪些词是以字母N开头的单词?)Nest/Nine/Numbers begins with letter N.【3】Please circle the word which begins with letter N ? (请圈出以N开头的单词)【4】What sound does letter N make? （N发什么音?）N makes the sound /n/（此处为自然拼读音标）.【5】Please circle the word that begins with the sound /n/.(请圈出以/n/开头的单词.)【6】What sound does Nine/Numbers/Nest/Necklace（项链）/Noodles/Nuts/Net begins with?引导孩子说 Nine/Numbers/Nest/Necklace/Noodles/Nuts/Net begins with the sound /n/.

Title: LA-U3 L12  My family
Content: 本节课我们学习45-46课时Language Arts语文课Unit 3 Phonics for beginners. Lesson 12  My family主要学习目标如下:【1】学习了高频词with, my. 关键句是The trees are covered with snow. The snowman wears my scarf.【2】学习两个小文章I Can Nap.和 Tap with Me. 内容分别是I Can Nap.  Bear can nap. Nap, nap, nap, nap. I can nap with my bear. Nap, nap, nap, nap. Polar bears can nap. Nap, nap, nap, nap. I can nap with my polar bear. Nap, nap, nap, nap.Tap with Me.  I can tap. I tap, tap, tap. I can tap. Nan can tap. Nan can tap, tap, tap. I can tap with Nan. Tap, tap, tap. I am Tap Man! Tap, tap, tap! Tap Man!【3】学习一篇文章 My Family,理解Family的组成成员主要有mom, dad, brother, sister, grandma, grandpa, 会读这本小书;【4】简单理解Family Tree,理解一个家庭的构成体系;

Title: Math-C3 Lesson 1-8
Content: 本节课我们学习47-48课时,Math 数学课 Chapter 3. Lesson 1-8主要学习内容如下:【1】通过一个数学课件讲述主人公作为机场的工作人员,数行李箱的过程,引导孩子们掌握数字20-50【2】学习的关键词有suitcase(行李箱),passenger(乘客)【3】复习了one more than【4】There are seven footballs. Draw more to show twelve. 学习表达式:7+?=12.本节课的关键句是:【1】There are seven footballs. Draw more to show twelve. 学习表达式:7+?=12. 读法: Seven plus what number equals twelve.【2】What is twenty and one/two/three/…nine/ten more ?Twenty and one/two/three/…nine/ten more is twenty-one/twenty-two/twenty-three/…twenty-nine/thirty.您可以在家引导宝贝儿用关键句表达以下数学公式:20+1=21 20+2=22 20+3=23... ... 20+9=29 20+10=30...  ...  关于加法的概念，我们下个学年还会进一步引导孩子理解加法的推理过程是集合的概念，如果您发现孩子理解得还不是很好，请您不要着急，我们会反复复习，今后也会巩固哦~感谢您的理解!

Title: HSP-U2 L8 Animals grow and change
Content: 本节课我们学习49-50课时 HSP科学课 Unit 2 Animals. Lesson 8 How do animals grow and change?主要学习内容如下:【1】学习How do animals grow and change?简单学习了Animals and their babies【2】我们主要学习了Frog, Butterfly 和人的Life cycleFrog life cycle:No.1.eggs→No.2.tadpoles（蝌蚪）→No.3.baby frog→No.4.frogButterfly life cycle:No.1.egg→No.2.caterpillar→No.3.cocoon（茧）→No.4.butterflyPerson life cycle:No.1.egg+sperm （精子）→No.2.baby→No.3.child→No.4.young person→No.5. adult【3】我们复习了living things and nonliving things,what are animals like,What do animals need和动物的body covering动物的五种身体覆盖物: shells贝壳,scale鳞片,feather羽毛,fur皮毛,skin皮肤.【4】学习小文章Animals Grow and Change. 内容是life cycle, hatching duck—month-old duckling—adult duck, Animals change as they grow old. Frog eggs—tadpole with 2 legs—tadpole with 4 legs—adult frog

Title: Math-C3 L9
Content: 本节课我们学习51-52课时 Math 数学课 Chapter 3. Lesson 9主要学习内容如下:   【1】通过一个数钱的机器学习数字50-100【2】学习的生词有: penny便士, machine机器, tube管子, arrow箭头【3】重点区分ty与teen的发音, 如30 thirty 与13 thirteen, 40forty与14  fourteen【4】学会表达50到100之间的加法.如50+1=51 即为:One more than fifty is fifty-one.Fifty plus one equals fifty-one.

Title: HSP-U3 Plants L9 Many Plants
Content: 本节课我们学习53-54课时 HSP科学课 Unit3 Plants. Lesson 9 Many Plants 主要学习内容如下:【1】能够理解Plants are living things.植物是生物.【2】学习了plants植物主要分为三大类: trees树,shrubs（灌木）,grass草。理解Some plants have flowers有一些植物开花.【3】学会用词汇描述不同的植物:It’s a big/small/green/red/tall/short/heavy/light tree/shrub/flower/grass.【4】本节课的关键句是: They are trees.  They are shrubs.  They are grasses.  They are plants.【5】学习小文章Many Plants. 内容是: Tree, grass, shrub. Plants can be trees,grasses, and shrubs. There are many kinds of trees. There are many kinds of grasses. There are many kinds of shrubs.您可以在家引导宝贝儿多读一读哈。

Title: Math-C3 L10
Content: 本节课我们学习55-56课时 Math 数学课 Chapter 3 Lesson 10主要学习内容如下:【1】通过学习数学课件练习十个十个地数, 学习的生词有:easel画架,branch树枝,spot斑点,necktie领带【2】学习了两个数学课件,第一个讲述主人公将成箱菠萝装到车上,让孩子们了解skip count by 10s的概念;第二个讲述主人公在果汁工厂中,将菠萝汁打包的故事,让孩子们了解skip count by 5s的概念.【3】本节课的关键句是: Can you skip count by 5s and 10s?What is ten/twenty/thirty/…/ninety and ten more ?Ten/twenty/thirty/…/ninety and ten more is twenty/thirty/forty/…/one hundred.What is ten/fifteen/twenty/…/forty-five and five more ?Ten/fifteen/twenty/…/forty-five and five more is fifteen/twenty/twenty-five…/fifty.您可以在家引导宝贝儿用关键句表达以下数学公式:10+10=20 Ten and ten more is twenty.20+10=30   Twenty and ten more is thirty.30+10=40 Thirty and ten more is forty.... ...   ...  ...  5+5=10 Five and five more is ten.10+5=15 Ten and five is fifteen15+5=20 Fifteen and five more is twenty.感谢您的配合!

Title: HSP-U3 Plants L10 What Do Plants Need?
Content: 本节课我们学习57-58课时 HSP 科学课 Unit 3 Plants. Lesson 10 What Do Plants Need?主要学习内容如下:【1】复习了三种植物Trees树,Shrubs灌木丛,Grass草【2】学习What do plants need?植物生长需要的物质:Soil（泥土）,Water水,Air空气, Sunlight阳光, Space(空间)【3】学习了植物的生长过程lifestyleNo.1 seeds(种子) →No.2 roots(根部)→No.3 stem(茎) →No.4 leaf(叶子) →No.5 flower bud(花蕾) →No.6 flower【4】比较了Animals 和Plants,相同之处是animals和Plants都需要air, food, water, place to live, sunshine,他们都会grow(生长).不同之处是Animals can move(动物能够移动),Plants cannot move(植物不能移动)【5】学习了小文章What Plants Need. 内容是Light, air, soil, space to grow, water. Plants need air, light and water to live. Plants need soil. Plants need space to grow.

Title: Math-C4 L1-5 Make & Take Apart Numbers
Content: 本节课我们学习59-60课时 Math数学课Chapter 4 Lesson 1-5 Make & Take Apart Numbers主要学习内容如下:【1】引导学生学习数学课件,学会make 4 and 5, make 6 and 7,用不同的两个数字来组成4,5,6,7这几个数字方法有0 and 4 is 4; 1 and 3 is 4,2 and 2 is 4…【2】引导学生通过学习数学课件,学会take part 4 and 5, take apart 6 and 7方法有4 is 0 and 4, 4 is 1 and 3, 4 is 2 and 2【3】学习的生词有desk书桌,envelope信封,,library图书馆,cup杯子,spoon勺子,bone骨头,taxi出租车,dustbin垃圾箱,block积木,can罐头,anchor锚,whistle哨子,helmet头盔,bell铃铛,button纽扣,cube立方体【4】复习关键句是: Can you make four/…? One and three is four./…Can you take apart four/…?Four is one and three./…

Title: Math-C4 L6-9 Make & Take Apart Numbers
Content: 本节课我们学习61-62课时 Math数学课Chapter 4. Lesson 6-9 Make & Take Apart Numbers【1】通过学习数学课件,学会make 8 and 9, make 10,用不同的两个数字来组成8,9,10这几个数字方法有1 and 7 is 8; 2 and 6 is 8,3 and 5 is 8…【2】通过学习数学课件,学会take part 8 and 9, take apart 10方法有8 is 1 and 7, 8 is 2 and 6, 8 is 3 and 5【3】学习的生词有flag旗,coin硬币,bookmark书签,squirrel松鼠,basket篮子,juice果汁,pail桶,jam果酱,timer计时器,robot机器人,key钥匙,raindrop雨滴.【4】关键句是: Can you make eight/…? One and seven is eight./…Can you take apart eight/…? Eight is one and seven./…
